intro: Stellaria yinshanensis, commonly known as the Yinshan starwort, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of northern China. It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae, which includes many species with showy, often pink or white flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. Its small, star-shaped flowers are clustered in umbels, and it produces small, capsule-like fruits. Stellaria yinshanensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological niche.
